model.api

Class TTRSSApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.json.JSONObject
      • model.api.TTRSSApi

  • public class TTRSSApi
extends org.json.JSONObject
    Class that accesses the API for TT-RSS so that the API actions can be perfromed

    Sam

      • getHeadlines

        public void getHeadlines(java.util.Set<Article> articles,
                         java.lang.Integer id,
                         int limit,
                         java.lang.String viewMode,
                         boolean isCategory,
                         java.lang.Integer sinceId,
                         java.lang.String search,
                         ArticleOmitter filter)
                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Retrieves the specified articles.
        Parameters:
        articles - container for retrieved articles
        id - the id of the feed/category
        limit - the maximum number of articles to be fetched
        viewMode - indicates whether only unread articles should be included (Possible values: all_articles, unread, adaptive, marked, updated)
        isCategory - indicates if we are dealing with a category or a feed
        sinceId - the first ArticleId which is to be retrieved.
        search - search query
        filter - filter for articles, defining which articles should be omitted while parsing (may be null)
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if nothing works

      • getArticles

        public java.util.Set<Article> getArticles(java.lang.Integer id,
                                          int limit,
                                          java.lang.String viewMode,
                                          boolean isCategory,
                                          java.lang.Integer sinceId,
                                          java.lang.String search,
                                          ArticleOmitter filter)
                                   throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Gets the set of articles
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the feed/category
        limit - the maximum number of articles to be fetched
        viewMode - indicates whether only unread articles should be included (Possible values: all_articles, unread, adaptive, marked, updated)
        isCategory - indicates if we are dealing with a category or a feed
        sinceId - the first ArticleId which is to be retrieved.
        search - search query
        filter - filter for articles, defining which articles should be omitted while parsing (may be null)
        Returns:
        ret: Set
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if nothing works

      • setArticleStarred

        public boolean setArticleStarred(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> ids,
                                 int articleState)
                          throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Marks the given Article as "starred"/"not starred" depending on int articleState.
        Parameters:
        ids - a list of article-ids.
        articleState - the new state of the article (0 - not starred; 1 - starred; 2 - toggle).
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if nothing works
